name: polynomialfi-examples
description: Example usage of the Polynomial SDK (polynomialfi)

scripts.refresh: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install polynomialfi@latest && npm install
scripts.use-local: npm unlink polynomialfi 2>/dev/null || true && cd .. && npm link && cd examples && npm link polynomialfi
scripts.use-remote: npm unlink polynomialfi 2>/dev/null || true && npm install polynomialfi@latest
scripts.use-file: npm uninstall polynomialfi && npm install file:../
scripts.build-and-link: cd .. && npm run build && cd examples && npm run use-local

author: Polynomial Protocol
